event_type.description: Dotted event type (e.g., commons.transition.executed). Follows existing EventType pattern from vocabulary/event-types.ts.

payload.description: Event-specific data. Schema varies by event_type.

entry_hash.description: Domain-separated SHA-256 of this entry (excluding hash fields).

previous_hash.description: Hash of the preceding entry. Genesis entry uses AUDIT_TRAIL_GENESIS_HASH.

hash_domain_tag.description: The exact domain tag used when computing entry_hash. Format: "loa-commons:audit:<schema_$id>:<contract_version>". Persisted at write time so cross-version verification is unambiguous. (Flatline SKP-002)
